mapper.select: SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , P_CONTENT , P_SERVICE , CARE_LIST , P_MODE , M.USER_NO , USER_NAME , ADDRESS , CA_STATUS , FILE_PATH FROM PETSITTER P JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND P_NO = #{pno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PETSITTER WHERE P_MODE = 'Y'

SELECT P.P_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.CARE_LIST, M.ADDRESS, M.CA_STATUS, COUNT(R.REV_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM PETSITTER P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN RESERVATION RS ON P.P_NO = RS.REF_PNO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON RS.RES_NO = R.REF_RESNO WHERE P.P_MODE = 'Y' GROUP BY P.P_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.CARE_LIST, M.ADDRESS, M.CA_STATUS ORDER BY P.P_NO DESC

SELECT REV_NO , REV_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , A_CONTENT , A_DATE , R.FILE_PATH , M.USER_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN RESERVATION RS ON (RS.RES_NO = R.REF_RESNO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = RS.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN PETSITTER P ON (P.P_NO = RS.REF_PNO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND P_NO = ${pno} ORDER BY REV_NO DESC

SELECT DOG_NO , DOG_NAME , DOG_GENDER , DOG_BREED , EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DOG_BIRTHDAY) + 1 AS DOG_AGE , DOG_WEIGHT , FILE_PATH , P_NO FROM DOG D JOIN PETSITTER P USING (USER_NO) WHERE D.STATUS = 'Y' AND P_NO = ${pno}
